title: Hybrid Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the cultivation of learners' ability to apply mathematics to solve real-life problems.

learning_goals: Learners engage in online and offline learning activities with over 80% attendance using the flipped learning cycle
Learners achieve at least 70% of weekly learning goals by applying self-regulated learning strategies
Learners document their thinking process during math problem-solving using metacognitive strategies in reflection journals at least three times
Learners refine project deliverables by incorporating peer assessments and instructor feedback in a blended flipped learning environment
Learners maintain a 5-point scale average of 4 or higher in learning engagement for 4 weeks based on the MUSIC motivation model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
